text: Thanks Felix, not sure if there have been conversations yet around the last email Scott sent about testing the new pattern and trying some new overlap directions on that front, but we should discuss that in the mix and make it a priority. Also just a reminder, Matt will be in this afternoon after class.

yeah, would love to discuss this afternoon or tomorrow morning. I remember that removing the pattern for week view was a deliberate decision that was agreed upon by all parties, so if we do revisit the treatment, i would want to make sure we clarify the goals for that view.

Let’s discuss this afternoon for sure - it sounds like adidas would like to test new home directions and push to build this new version of home for launch, so I think we need to push forward on all of these fronts starting today.

Jenna and I will be connecting with Adam on the plans for testing this morning, so we’ll follow up when we have more information, but we’ll likely need to kick into gear on making prototype updates for testing asap as well.
oh reeeeealllly

text: We didn’t talk about it in our meeting but <@U026PLK4S> and <@U0HPGQ4KH> did you guys have any input on Scott’s request for alternate Fluid pattern visualizations? I did some super simple photoshopping to the existing pattern to get a feel for transparency and overlapping + colors. Feel free to come take a look and help me understand how I can be directing Chris to move forward with pattern experimentations in OpenGL.
I think that was mostly Scott jazz. Now it appears that they’d like us to move forward with the “fluid” we already have
Sorry for not clarifying Trent, we confirmed they want the current “fluid” design in this prototype
We will circle back to new patterns (or riffs on existing) next week
After we get this proto out
Oh ok. He still wants us to poke at that “Experiment” section he wrote out though right? (after our prototype stuff)
Yes I believe he would still like us to push forward on the Experiment stuff
We’ll do that after the prototype like you mentioned
cool
Oh I just saw my note to remind you <@U026103R3> about the universal spec doc motion guidelines I brought up last week
Not the most ideal time I know, but just a reminder
Oh yes! Thank you for the reminder Trent. I think I need to ask you to remind us again at a later date :slightly_smiling_face: Maybs next week?
I’ll keep the sticky up on my monitor :thumbsup:
Thanks
thank youuuu
It is some Jazz, and I’m interested in exploring, but it’s not for this round. Will come and see what you have played with though.
